Description: Arab National Bank (known as: Arab National) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since January 1993. Arab National operates within the Banks sector focusing on Diversified Banks. It has companies operating across Saudi Arabia and Cayman Islands. Arab National is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in June 1979.
